name: quick-git
title: Quick Git
description: Quickly run git commands through Raycast
author: joshdales

commands.name: set-repo
commands.title: Set Quick Git Repo
commands.subtitle: Set the repo that you want to focus on
commands.description: Manage the current repo that Quick Git will operate in

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
